name: Unchained
title: Why Sony Launched an Ethereum L2?
text:
Synopsis
Sony is strategically positioning itself in the Web3 ecosystem by launching on Ethereum, recognizing it as the most robust and decentralized blockchain platform for future development.

Key Insights
- Sony has launched an initiative (ACM) on an Ethereum Layer 2 network
- The company is joining the "super chain" ecosystem
- Sony's decision is driven by aligning with Web3 community and technology trends
- Ethereum is viewed by Sony as the most decentralized and attention-worthy blockchain platform
